#summary Web Screen-shot captures a web screen for you(Multilingual Supported).
#labels Featured

Web Screenshot is a single project in Spider.Net. You may use it without other projects. Web Screenshot takes a screen shot of a web-site. Just filling url and clicking save, you can have a screen shot of your web site.

A screen shot of Web Screenshot is in: [http://huchengtw.googlepages.com/webscreenshot.jpg screen shot]. The result is in: [http://huchengtw.googlepages.com/spiderframework.jpg spiderframework]
